page.title: 11The Arts in Kinver
page.content: There are two drama societies: the New Kinver Players and the Kinver Light Operatic Society. These groups have regular public performances. A travelling theatre company Â£Pentabus' is based in the village. The Edgecliff School Association promotes celebrity lectures for example Chris Bonnington on climbing and someone speaking about the raising of the Mary Rose. There is a film club. The library exhibits paintings and photographs by local people and also craftwork such as corn dollies, lacework and jewellry. There is an Historical Society and a Civic Society which hold meetings and publish material on conservation and local history. The West Midland Light Orchestra rehearses in Edgecliff School.
